content:
When you're at the store, the sales associate can definitely check if there are any digital coupons or loyalty rewards that you can use on top of any other discounts.

Here are some things they can check:

1. **Digital Coupons**: The sales associate can check if there are any digital coupons available for the specific KitchenAid stand mixer you're interested in. These coupons might be loaded onto your Bed Bath & Beyond loyalty account or mobile app.
2. **Loyalty Rewards**: If you're a member of Bed Bath & Beyond's loyalty program, the sales associate can check if you have any rewards or points that can be redeemed on your purchase.
3. **Email Exclusive Offers**: If you've signed up for Bed Bath & Beyond's email newsletter, the sales associate can check if there are any exclusive offers or promo codes that you can use.
4. **Mobile App Offers**: If you have the Bed Bath & Beyond mobile app, the sales associate can check if there are any app-exclusive offers or digital coupons that you can use.

To make sure you get the most out of your purchase, ask the sales associate to:

* Check your loyalty account for any available rewards or points
* Look for digital coupons or promo codes that can be applied to your purchase
* Verify if there are any email exclusive offers or app-only deals that you can use
* Combine any applicable discounts, coupons, or rewards to get the best possible price

By asking the sales associate to check on these, you can maximize your savings and get the best deal on your KitchenAid stand mixer!
